properties.text: Welcome to ${SERVICE_NAME}

Here is the full set of instructions.
To start the game over, you can say 'Start Over' at any time.
If you want me to repeat the question, just say 'Repeat',
If you're experiencing issues with the correct answer recognition, please answer just using the letter choice.
To exit the quiz at any time, use the words 'Stop' or 'Cancel'.

properties.comment: Set finish variable to null

properties.text: How many players want to play the game?
Can you tell me how many players want to play the game?

properties.text: Please say a number one through four.
Say a number one through four.
Can you repeat the number? One through four players can play.
Please repeat the number. One through four players can play.

Please tell me the name of Player ${player_counter + 1}.

properties.comment: Singleplayer score

properties.comment: Multiplayer - unique score

properties.comment: Multiplayer - when some are scores the same

properties.text: The last place is shared between ${human_concat(status.names, 'and')} with ${status.score} out of 3 questions correct.
The ${ordinal(status.rank)} place is shared between ${human_concat(status.names, 'and')} with ${status.score} out of 3 questions correct.
